biotools.summary: Retrieve and process large sets of next-generation sequencing (NGS) data with a single step. Automated set-up-and-analysis pipeline utilizing the Aspera, SRA Toolkit, bwtool, Samtools FastQC, Trimmomatic, HISAT2, STAR, and HOMER applications.

bioschemas.name: OCTOPUS-toolkit
bioschemas.summary: Retrieve and process large sets of next-generation sequencing (NGS) data with a single step. Automated set-up-and-analysis pipeline utilizing the Aspera, SRA Toolkit, bwtool, Samtools FastQC, Trimmomatic, HISAT2, STAR, and HOMER applications.
